```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Naming conventions for groups

Default values:

```{r cars}

options(dtrackr.strata_glue="{.group}:{.value}")
options(dtrackr.strata_sep="; ")

```

Compare with:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}

options(dtrackr.strata_glue="{.value}")
options(dtrackr.strata_sep=", ")

```
